titles.title: USDA Debarment Act of 1993

A bill to require the Secretary of Agriculture to carry out procedures for debarment of persons engaged in nonprocurement programs and activities with the Department of Agriculture who have violated the regulations of a program, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S15103-15104)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Agricultural Research.

committee.name: Senate Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry
committee.subcommittee: Agricultural Research, Conservation, Forestry and General Legislation

bill.summary: 11/4/1993--Introduced. USDA Debarment Act of 1993 - Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to carry out debarment procedures against persons materially violating nonprocurement program regulations.
